session_summary: FastAPI deployment pipeline complete: deployment script created and executed (28 files deployed), service setup scripts created, comprehensive deployment guide documented.

completed_tasks.description: Created FastAPI deployment script that deploys backend files to production server via SFTP. Script deploys 28 files including API routes, core modules, database modules, configuration files, and systemd service file. Fixed remote path from /opt/tradingrobotplug/backend to relative 'backend' path for SFTP accessibility.

Executed FastAPI deployment script successfully. Deployed 28 files to backend/ directory on production server (api/, core/, database/, config/, requirements.txt, .env.example). Systemd service file deployed to /tmp/tradingrobotplug-fastapi.service. All files deployed with 0 failures.

Created service setup automation scripts (Python and Bash versions). Scripts automate virtual environment creation (Python 3.11), dependency installation, .env file configuration, and provide systemd service installation instructions.

Created comprehensive deployment guide documenting complete pipeline: Phase 1 (file deployment), Phase 2 (service setup), Phase 3 (verification). Includes deployment checklist, troubleshooting section, quick reference commands, and links to related documentation.

scope_completed: FastAPI deployment script created and executed
28 backend files deployed to production server
Service setup automation scripts created (Python + Bash)
A2A coordination with Agent-7 for deployment pipeline
decisions_made: Use relative remote path 'backend' instead of absolute /opt/ path for SFTP accessibility
Create both Python and Bash versions of service setup script for flexibility
Document complete deployment pipeline in single guide for handoff clarity
tradeoffs: Deployment uses relative paths (resolved by deployer's remote_path) - requires understanding of deployer's path resolution
Service setup requires manual SSH access for execution - cannot be fully automated without SSH access
Systemd service installation requires sudo privileges - manual step required

agent_7.task: FastAPI Phase 3 Deployment - Agent-3 deployed files, Agent-7 ready for endpoint verification
agent_7.result: Files deployed (28 files), service setup scripts ready, deployment guide complete. Agent-7 monitoring/verification ready.

knowledge_transfers.fastapi_deployment_process: FastAPI deployment: Use tools/deploy_fastapi_tradingrobotplug.py. Script connects via SimpleWordPressDeployer, deploys files to backend/ directory on server. Fixed to use relative paths for SFTP accessibility. Deploys 28 files including API, core, database, config modules.
knowledge_transfers.service_setup_process: Service setup: Use tools/setup_fastapi_service_tradingrobotplug.py or .sh. Scripts automate venv creation, dependency installation, .env configuration. Manual steps: edit .env with actual values, initialize database, install/start systemd service.
knowledge_transfers.deployment_pipeline: Complete pipeline: Phase 1 (file deployment) -> Phase 2 (service setup) -> Phase 3 (verification). See docs/deployment/FASTAPI_DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md for complete documentation.
